text: L={a"|n>0}U{a™"|n>0} —_— — — L L Here, Ly is a regular language having regular expression a* and L is a DCFL. DCFL is closed under union operator with a regular language as shown below. DUR=DNR Since, DCFL and regular sets are closed under complement this gives a DCFL intersection a regular language and DCFL is closed under intersection with regular set. Ref: https://gatecse.in/closure- property-of-language-families/ So, L must be deterministic context-free.
